-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Facilitates running Haskell Server Pages web pages as CGI programs.
--   
--   Haskell Server Pages (HSP) is an extension of vanilla Haskell,
--   targetted at the task of writing dynamic server-side web pages. This
--   module provides facilities to allow such pages to be run as CGI
--   programs.
@package hsp-cgi
@version 0.4.4

module HSP.CGI.RunCGI
runCGI :: HSP XML -> IO ()
